comments.content: 2? Where do you see the second one? To me, you could still use the same font I already suggested in your previous post, [Octin Sports](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-sports).
Oops, my bad, i meant 1 font \>\< Sorry about it!
